name: search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Performs a search on YouTube using the specified parameters and returns the search results.

hl.description: The language code for the response (e.g., 'en' for English). Defaults to 'en'.

gl.description: The country code for the response (e.g., 'US' for the United States). Defaults to 'US'.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to continue fetching results. Defaults to None.

q.description: The search query term. Defaults to 'movie'.
